sentences.en: "Forgive my manners," she said calmly. "I neglected to introduce myself."
sentences.cn: “请原谅我礼数不周，”她平静地说。“我忘了自我介绍了。”
被人忽略了的研究领域

sentences.en: At times they have been shamefully neglected.
sentences.cn: 有时他们被忽略了，真是不应该。

sentences.en: He neglected to follow the instructions.
He neglected to write and say " Thank you " .
He'd given too much to his career, worked long hours, neglected her.
sentences.cn: 他在事业上投入太多了，长时间地工作，冷落了她。

sentences.en: In his preoccupation with Robyn, Crook had neglected everything.
sentences.cn: 克鲁克一心想着罗宾，忽略了其他一切事情。

sentences.en: It is a sadly neglected work.
sentences.cn: 这件工作不幸被严重忽视了.

sentences.en: Some of the most significant issues were neglected.
sentences.cn: 最重要的问题中,有些被忽略了.

sentences.en: The company was publicly rebuked for having neglected safety procedures.
sentences.cn: 公司因忽略了安全规程而受到公开批评。

sentences.en: The house wore a neglected look.
sentences.cn: 这房子给人一种没人照料的印象.

sentences.en: The journal she had begun lay neglected on her bedside table.
sentences.cn: 她很早以前就开始看的那本杂志搁在床头柜上，好久没翻了。

sentences.en: The study of this subject is undeservedly neglected today.
sentences.cn: 现今,这门学科的研究受到不应有的忽视.

sentences.en: The woman denied that she had neglected her child.
sentences.cn: 那位女士否认疏于照管自己的孩子。

sentences.en: While slogging at work, have you neglected your marriage?
sentences.cn: 埋头工作的时候，你是否忽视了自己的婚姻？

words.tran_cn: 疏忽的；忽略的；不小心的
被忽视的；未被好好照管的

phrases.tran_cn: 玩忽职守；[法]失职；过失责任

trans.tran_cn: 疏忽( neglect的过去式和过去分词 )，忽略，遗漏，疏于照顾
trans.tran_en: If you neglect someone or something, you fail to give them the amount of attention that they deserve
